Title: Saleswoman
Description: a person whose job is aiming at selling out the products of the company.

Title: Software Developer
Description: a person whose job is building software.

Title: Chief Financial Officer
Description: a person whose job is managing cash flow of the company.

Title: General Manager
Description: a person whose job is daily management of the company.

Title: Network Administrator
Description: a person whose job is managing the network setup of the company.
